name: Streamlabs Desktop Overlay
summary: An OVERLAY file is an overlay collection used by Streamlabs Desktop (formerly Streamlabs OBS), a program used to capture and stream video game gameplay and other content. It is used to add one or more scenes to Streamlabs Desktop. Users can export and import OVERLAY files from Streamlabs Desktop's Settings â†’ Scene Collections menu.
